description: A lightweight shield made of otherworldy metal.
The hand of the almighty Flame God himself, gives it's wielder the ability to conjure flame-nadoes .

name: Youmuu's Haste
apply_message: Petals begin to drop from the ghostblade as you feel more nimble and quick
remove_message: You return to your normal speed.

name: Youmuu's Haste
description: You throttle your gunblade engine.

name: Inaka's Fervor
apply_message: Inaka's Fervor fills you with agility!
remove_message: You return to your normal speed.

name: Sash Cast
description: You throttle your gunblade engine.

name: Sash-Stop
description: reality around you warps around you and all monsters are frozern in place for 10 seconds.
message: You contemplate the meaning of your past.

name: Revealing Stun
description: reality around you warps around you and a single monster is frozern in place for 10 seconds.
message: You contemplate the meaning of your past.

name: Tons of Damage!
apply_message: You feel a burst of movement speed from striking a foe!
remove_message: You return to your normal speed.

name: Trinity Force Buff
description: You throttle your gunblade engine.
A small fraction of the Flame God's destructive power.

name: IBG Sheen Proc - dmg
sound_description: A field of ice slows your enemy!

name: IBG Sheen Proc
sound_description: A field of ice slows your enemy!

description: A gauntlet that has the ability to slow the target once every 4 hits. Wearing this provides some armor, speed, stamina, strength and dexterity.
A shield with the ability to slow targets in the area around you.
You channel their life force itself into your spiritual energy.  You spend hp to regain mana.
You channel their life force itself into your spiritual energy.  You spend hp to regain mana.
Robe made from sacred threads. Provides 1000 flat mana, 1.1x base mana, 1.25x mana regen, and +6 intelligence.
Robe made from sacred threads. Provides 2500 flat mana, 1.25x base mana, 1.5x mana regen, and +6 intelligence
Robe made from sacred threads. Provides 2500 flat mana, 1.25x base mana, 1.5x mana regen, and +6 intelligence
A runic cuirass adorned with magical shark-fins giving it's user the ability to dash short distances.
A runic cuirass adorned with magical shark-fins giving it's user the ability to dash short distances.
A burlap cloak fit for a giant, allows you to assume the power of king kyriakos, as his avatar
An ornate cape embroidered with magically aneled gold and held together by a singular broach made from bloodcrystal
An alchemical artifact seldom even believe to exist in true, though it's composition is well known.
This ancient rune artifact was originally found in the ruins of an aztec death-cult, it is said to turn whoever wears it into an extremely powerful immortal.

A large, adjustable sheath for holding swords and other large blades.  The hilt has a mechanical system that shoots out the sheathed blade with tremendous force, and this particular model is capable of holding 3 swords.
A large, adjustable sheath for holding swords and other large blades.  It's hilt has a mechanical system that shoots out the sheathed blade with tremendous force.
A spiritual entity that is invisible to the naked eye, though you and other spirit guardian users can see it.
A spiritual flame created by the youthful burning energy of its weare's soul.
A metaphysical realm that exists within your soul, could be used to retreat from reality for a brief moment.
A morbid essence gathered from evil demons, used by dark wizards to enhance their presence.
As you delve into the arts of lichcraft, your body grows painful and cold. Is this worth it for the power?
The crown of the lich king confers his accursed blessing of supreme lichery upon it's wearer.
A morbid essence gathered from evil demons, used by dark wizards to enhance their presence.
As you delve into the arts of lichcraft, your body grows painful and cold. Is this power truly worth the price of humanity?

name: Bleeding Brand
desc: your wound bleeds and stings... evil is near
apply_message: You feel evil lurking around every corner...
remove_message: You are no longer marked for sacrifice.

name: Brand of Sacrifice
description: This marking signifies you are an offering to the God Hand, destined to be devoured by the apostles. It draws death near any who bear this cursed heraldry, and causes constant pain to the marked one.

A sacred religious adornement to the original creators of beskar arms, according to their beliefs if you put don this helmet you are never to show your face to another, until you meet death in battle...
A crown worn by Bahamut, The King of Dragons, can be used to cast megaflare.
A crown worn by the lich king imbued with the power of true immortality.
Gauntlets made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Very light and durable.
A small relic from a forgotten saint.  As extraordinary as the world has become it may have some power yet.
Cloth made from runesilk worn by dragon monks to empower their draconic abilities.
a glove made from bright red magical silk, meant to evoke the presence of the great dragon grigori, worn by the avatar to enhance his dragon-form techniques.
A pair of beskar boots complete with a set of plate leggings
An ancient Roman laminar armor, made of overlapping metal strips connected to internal leather straps.
Gauntlets made from magically imbued metals.
A full helmet made from rune.
A pair of runic sabatons along with a matching plated rune tassets.
An ancient Roman laminar armor, made of overlapping metal strips connected to internal leather straps.

Few are fortunate enough to come across the tears of the very goddess who created our world... but those who are lucky enough to acquire a Tear of the Goddess may take pleasure in a significant boost of mana points and mana points regeneration.

A magical stone with the ability to painlessly attach to your body at will. This stone can also hold any singular item within a small area around the stone in a perpetual stasis, allowing for both quick access and sturdy storage

An older, clunkier variation of the integrated gimbal mods seen today, this variant isn't good for much more than operating heavy weaponry with relative ease. The arm supports the weight of the weapon without assistance, allowing it to double as a holster for almost any weapon.
A blood-soaked trinket carried by Inaka for an unknown reason.
A yellow sash draped over the body meant to resemble the heads of ghidra, worn by the avatar to enhance his dragon-form techniques.

The Dragon's Dogma, a promise to temper the volition of the arisen so that he may become the seneschal, keeper to the cycle of destruction and creator of the dragon. Only those who have had their heart stolen by a dragon are doomed to this fate, though perhaps it is more than fate that governs this process

A sword with the ability to slay even gods, obtained from defeating the seneschal, this item represents the ability to transcend fate itself, and overcome even the most dire odds through one's own volition.
Ancient garb worn by warriors of the past, this particular set worn by legendary warrior Inaka has been imbued with the ability to dash short distances.
A blade used by the legendary white wolf, each swing of the blade does 50 cold damage.
A blade used by the legendary white wolf, can summon his companion to your aid.
A blade used by a renowned assassin, no one knows his face and seldom knew his name, though his bloodied legacy lives on through this accursed sword.
This weapon was used by a great duelist, can be used to temporarily stun a creature (10 turns).
Heals a little bit of damage on the target.
Tons of damage!
Tons of damage!

A magical stone with the ability to painlessly attach to your body at will. This stone can also hold any singular item within a small area around the stone in a perpetual stasis, allowing for both quick access and sturdy storage

A magical stone with the ability to painlessly attach to your body at will. This stone can also hold any singular item within a small area around the stone in a perpetual stasis, allowing for both quick access and sturdy storage

A custom-made leather harness with dual-horizontal shoulder holsters fitted under the armpits, allowing large guns to be stored with ease. There are also custom fittings on the back of the harness for a specialized cross-holster that can hold 2 more weapons. All of the weapons can be accessed with extreme quickness due to the elite materials and design
A holobag that's been fractal-holographically expanded to allow for even more storage.
Tales tell of a swordsmith with the ability to mend mana and steel together as one, this masterwork is proof of such a tale.
A cursed staff stolen from a lich priest, could be used to cast healing spells.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: A purple cap with a gaping maw fixed in a perpetual smile, something about this hat gives a nasty aura.
A mythical staff once held in the hands of Seraph, a mythological figure supposedly involved in the creation of magic.
A circular beam of rainbow-colored light that naturally sits a few inches above its wearer's head.
A small floating stone perpetually in an orbit around the wearer's head.
A small floating stone perpetually in an orbit around the wearer's head.
A small floating stone perpetually in an orbit around the wearer's head.
A small floating stone perpetually in an orbit around the wearer's head.
